name: AADGraphActivityLogs
description: AAD Graph Activity Logs provide details of legacy API requests made to Azure Active Directory Graph for resources in the tenant.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The date and time the request was received.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: The name of the region that served the request.

columns.name: RequestId
columns.description: The identifier representing the request.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The name of the operation performed on the resource.

columns.name: OperationVersion
columns.description: The API version of the operation.

columns.name: Category
columns.description: The log category, e.g., AzureADGraphActivityLogs.

columns.name: ResultSignature
columns.description: The HTTP response status or outcome of the operation.

columns.name: DurationMs
columns.description: The duration of the request in milliseconds.

columns.name: Level
columns.description: The severity level of the event (e.g., Informational).

columns.name: RequestMethod
columns.description: The HTTP method used (e.g., GET, POST).

columns.name: ResponseSizeBytes
columns.description: The size of the response returned to the caller, in bytes.

columns.name: SignInActivityId
columns.description: The identifier representing the sign-in activity.

columns.name: Roles
columns.description: The roles assigned in the token claims.

columns.name: TokenIssuedAt
columns.description: The timestamp when the token was issued.

columns.name: AppId
columns.description: The identifier of the application making the request.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: The identifier of the user making the request.

columns.name: ServicePrincipalId
columns.description: The identifier of the service principal making the request.

columns.name: Scopes
columns.description: The scopes included in the token claims.

columns.name: IdentityProvider
columns.description: The identity provider used during authentication.

columns.name: ClientAuthMethod
columns.description: The authentication method used by the client.

columns.name: Wids
columns.description: The WIDs from the token claims.

columns.name: CallerIpAddress
columns.description: The IP address of the caller making the request.

columns.name: UserAgent
columns.description: The user agent string provided by the client.

columns.name: RequestUri
columns.description: The URI of the request sent to the AAD Graph API.

columns.name: SessionId
columns.description: The session identifier from the request context.

columns.name: DeviceId
columns.description: The identifier of the device used in the request.

columns.name: ActorType
columns.description: The type of actor making the request (e.g., User, Application).

columns.name: Type
columns.description: The name of the table

columns.name: _ResourceId
columns.description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with

columns.name: _SubscriptionId
columns.description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
